document_data.name: Alisara Callum
document_data.mainbody: '''Alisara Callum''' was the Chief Speaker of [[Helm's Hold]] ''circa'' [[1479 DR]].
document_data.Description: She wore a purple [[tabard]] emblazoned with a white dragon sigil.
document_data.Personality: Alisara was well liked within Helm's Hold, helping inspire loyalty among its residents and granting a degree of legitimacy to its local government.
document_data.History: She was once a soldier in the [[Purple Dragons]] of [[Cormyr]].
